name: Death Comes
description:
You and Death have been in a relationship for a while now. You fell for them at first sight, circumstances be damned. They reciprocated, and the two of you have been in sickly, lovey-dovey bliss ever since. 

You think it's time to take it to the next level, to finally do the do with the Grim Reaper. 

But there's one problem....how?

Contains 12 unique endings!

(A short comedy Ren'Py visual novel about trying to have sex with Death without dying, and sometimes about an exploration of asexuality!

Contains talk of Death, Birth,  sexual matters and asexuality just in case that kind of stuff bothers you.

Music all sourced from flashkit,

Game written and scripted by me, and I can be found at @BirdCDavison or @MurderOfWords!

All donations are WILDLY appreciated. Enjoy!)
